programme.title: Adele One Night Only
programme.desc: A 2-hour. star-studded special event featuring 15-time Grammy@-winning singer performing new songs from her highly anticipated 4th studio album, 30, as well as her biggest past hits. An intimate and interactive performance in front of close friends and a star-studded audience, filmed at the iconic Los Angeles Griffith Park Observatory. Including an Oprah Winfrey no-holds barred interview plus additional surprise celebrity moments.

programme.title: Mika: Sinfonia Pop - Live in Italy
programme.desc: In October 2015, BRIT Award winner and pop singer-songwriter sensation Mika lit up the stage of Italy's Teatro Sociale di Como. Joined by an especially assembled orchestra for the occasion, and conducted by Simon Leclerc of the Montreal Symphony Orchestra, the Grace Kelly hit-maker delivered an exceptional concert performance of both new tracks and classic hits from his career. Includes Elle Me Dit, Happy Ending and the Grammy nominated Love Today.

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep US S1
programme.desc: The classic TV game show Supermarket Sweep, hosted and executive produced by Emmy Award-nominated comedienne and actress Leslie Jones is a fast-paced and energetic series following three teams of two as they battle it out using their grocery shopping skills and knowledge of merchandise to win big cash prizes.

programme.title: Little Big Shots S4
programme.desc: In a completely reimagined new season, Melissa McCarthy meets with some of the most inspiring and hilarious kids from all corners of the globe.

programme.title: Tugan Sokhiev conducts Sumi Jo at Taipei National Concert Hall
programme.desc: Orchestre National Du Capitole De Toulouse at Taipei National Concert Hall. Conducted by Tugan Sokhiev with Sumi Jo.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabets are V and W . Space residents of Planet V and W have a new plant. They need something that can help with the growth of their new plant. Can our superheroes help?

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus
programme.desc: The adventurers are at a face painting workshop for their first activity. Next, they head to a mural painting workshop. For their final stop, the adventurers went exploring at the museum.

programme.title: Barbie Dreamtopia S1
programme.desc: Barbie's youngest sister, Chelsea, takes us on a fantastical journey to the land of her dreams. Together with their friends, Chelsea and Barbie embark on amazing adventures as they explore exciting new lands full of limitless possibility and important life lessons.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Billy is not a huge fan of Halloween, but Tim loves everything about it... except werewolves. A magical mishap turns Billy into a werewolf, spooking Tim. Tim runs away with the only pumpkin left, which is needed to make the cure for Billy. Paula and the rest have to race against the clock to find Tim and pumpkin, or Billy will be stuck as a werewolf forever!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: Poly-GON and Stimp have joined forces! The Ollie Squad meets their match in this nefarious bounty hunter-shapeshifter partnership.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Pony Life S2
programme.desc: In the brand new Pony Life, the ponies relocate to Sugarcube Corner, a local bakery hangout run by Pinkie Pie, for more magical adventures!

programme.title: PJ Masks S3
programme.desc: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko as the heroic trio goes into the night to save the day!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: Ash and Goh set out to find a special island spoken of in rumors---what kind of discoveries will they make?

programme.title: Agents Of Sprawl
programme.desc: UnyX is out of the picture. Without her guidance, Zayd, Meiling and Norman go their separate ways. It takes the power of friendship and self-discovery for them to reform the team. With UnyX missing in action and the odds stacked against them, can the trio really summon enough cunning and teamwork to save the world?

programme.title: Lil Wild Special
programme.desc: It's holiday season and the zoo has a new addition - Kwong, a brash all action pangolin. Watch as the Lil Wild gang tackle the chaos that ensues, and learns to adjust to the latest addition of their pack. This onetime episode will also include the exciting release of three new songs performed by local artistes like ShiGGa Shay, Estelle Fly, and YAO.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: The pressure of the tournament is making Daigo nervous about his upcoming match against Yugo. In doing research about Yegdrion, he stumbles onto some information he wishes he hadn't discovered. Rantaro and Hoji find out that they'll have to take on their close friends next.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two men, Charlie Hinton (Eddie Murphy) and Phil Ryerson (Jeff Garlin), get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Super Hero High
programme.desc: Super Hero High is buzzing with excitement over new student Supergirl. But when Supergirl crash-lands into the cafeteria, it's evident that, although she has incredible powers, she has a long way to go before she becomes a Super Hero.

programme.title: Why Not?
programme.desc: Deeply impressed by what a certain superhero can do, Dr Why again attempts to overcome the boundaries of human limitation by attempting to walk on walls. Using the science of adhesion and air pressure, many tubes of glue, industrial equipment and a few balloons, he begins his ascent up a building...

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S21

programme.title: Let's Celebrate 2022
programme.desc: (Encore) Catch exciting performances by our local artists such as Kit Chan, Taufik Batisah, Nathan Hartono, Jasmine Sokko, Yung Raja and many more as we countdown to 2022. Catch their exclusive performances from The Float @ Marina Bay to iconic landmarks across our island like you've never seen them before! Hosted by Sonia Chew and Joakim Gomez on “Let's Celebrate 2022” will set you bouncing into the new year with lots of anticipation.

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as humans really do exist.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Queen: Hungarian Rhapsody - Live In Budapest
programme.desc: On 27th July 1986, Queen performed the largest ever stadium concert at the Nepstadium in Budapest to a crowd of 80,000 ecstatic fans, this was also the first Western Rock concert in a stadium behind the Iron Curtain. The show held such significance to the Hungarian authorities that an unprecedented collaboration of the country's top film cameraman and technicians were formed to record it.

programme.title: Second Act
programme.desc: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

programme.title: The Morricone Duel
programme.desc: Celebrating the works of famous composer, Ennio Morricone, whose works include The Hateful Eight, Inglourious Basterds, In the Line of Fire, Django Unchained.

programme.desc: Mr Garden Gnome is behaving strangely, turns out he's sleepwalking. The children are afraid to wake him up and through their experience, they learn how to deal with sleepwalkers. Astrid is on an alien dog-sitting mission, but one of the alien dogs go missing. The children head to outer space to help Astrid. However, the alien doggies are more difficult to handle than they thought.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8

programme.title: Lil Wild S2
programme.desc: When word gets around that a wild animal has broken into the wildlife park, chaos rules as groups of animals take sides and turn against each other. Rara and the gang try to hunt down the monster in their midst. Relegated to playing lookout, Meep decides to search for the animal on his own - but he's not the only one. A poacher is also hot on the animal's trail! Can the Lil Wild team catch the monster before the poacher does?

programme.title: Katherine Jenkins: Believe: Live From The O2 (2010)

Whether breaking bad to feed the family, or engaging in a bit of mutual back-scratching, many of these apparent miscreants are actually helping out. programme.title: 爸比，我挺你

programme.title: 食在好源头
programme.desc: (重)《食在好源头》再次来到韩国，这次启程到全罗道。在寒冷的冬季是很多食材的收成时节！海苔我们常吃得多，你知道它的采收过程有多独特，可是又充满危险吗？Pornsak还和海女们一起出海捞泥蚶，收成过程分秒必争，一点也不能松懈，他还遇到什么趣事呢？而韩国草莓长得又红又大，秘诀何在？还有什么不容错过的精彩源头？一起跟随Pornsak去探索各种桌上佳肴背后的辛劳吧.

programme.title: 豆腐街
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 一部缠绵悱恻, 温馨感人的四十年代怀旧剧. 故事描述早期华人从中国南来新加坡时, 集居在牛车水一条俗称 “豆腐街” 的大杂院里。这一郡性格与际遇各异的小市民，虽为了生活奔波劳碌，但能同舟共济互相扶持。本剧无论在道具，布景及服饰方面，都下了一番心血，务必让观众能投入在四十年代的情怀里. 在播映期间，动人的故事赚人热泪，引起观众热烈的反应。还有，剧中的演员将人物诠释的活灵活现, 更是功不可抹.

programme.title: 食分绝配
programme.desc: 土香味是那种很难用文字描述，但一闻到你即刻就会知道的味道。有些人可能不习惯泥土的气味，但有人却迷恋这种独特又质朴的风味，因为这气味建立起了都市人和自然、土地的连接。在这一集里，杨应晖将走访不同餐馆，向厨师们了解他们是如何在菜肴里应用土香味，并试着以这独特的风味，呈现出一道土香浓郁的新新料理.

programme.title: 香港原味道 （第四辑）
programme.desc: 《香港原味道》新四辑，谭玉瑛第四次领军，带着黄庭锋、孔德贤、林正峰继续追味寻源，从香港农田、鱼排，见证本地农业、渔业的发展。深入土炮食材的产地，寻找真正来自本港或香港制造的优质食材。每集深入认识一种地道食材，走进本土鱼场、鲜果园、鲜菜园、水耕菜工场、食品厂、酱油厂等等，发掘更多本地饮食智慧，品尝每一口新鲜美味，探索每一种港产食材背后的故事.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理

programme.title: 豆腐街
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 一部缠绵悱恻, 温馨感人的四十年代怀旧剧. 故事描述早期华人从中国南来新加坡时, 集居在牛车水一条俗称 “豆腐街” 的大杂院里。这一郡性格与际遇各异的小市民，虽为了生活奔波劳碌，但能同舟共济互相扶持。本剧无论在道具，布景及服饰方面，都下了一番心血，务必让观众能投入在四十年代的情怀里. 在播映期间，动人的故事赚人热泪，引起观众热烈的反应。还有，剧中的演员将人物诠释的活灵活现, 更是功不可抹.

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: (重) 在崇尚自由的香港，住了一群为自由流亡的人。但香港政府不曾签署“联合国难民公约”，无责任收留难民。而难民在这里申请合法难民认证的手续十分繁复，许多人一等就是十多年， 当中不少在香港有了下一代。这群身份尴尬的异国小孩，在努力尝试融入香港的生活的同时，随时准备着他们的世界将因“难民资格”遭否决而彻底瓦解.

programme.title: 吃。东西 2
programme.desc: (重) 汉堡包源自德国城市汉堡，起初是牛肉碎煎成的牛肉饼，后来传到美国，才有了面包夹肉的汉堡包。肉夹馍被称为中式汉堡包，而扣肉包经过改良，不仅体型变小馅料也缤纷多彩。也有人将馒头取代汉堡面包，新口味创意无限.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 秀美一直拿着燕珠不孕的事做文章，指把汉洁交给他们其实是帮了燕珠一个大忙。岂料，春玉却突然宣布燕珠怀孕了。秀美担心燕珠等人会抛弃汉洁，于是跪求他们把汉洁当成自己的孩子抚养.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 众人意识到只有找到景华陷害SC的证据才可以扭转局势。露莉于是着手调查金东一的下落。明朗偷走爱莉的手机，冒充爱莉发简讯给朴本部长，终于知道东一被安置在哪间医院.

programme.title: 我男人的秘密
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 志燮发现瑞拉怀孕，一直放心不下。美红为了拿到补偿金，告诉海琳瑞拉在外面有男人，志燮不敢相信瑞拉交了男朋友，却看到离开公司的瑞拉，靠在别的男人怀里.

programme.title: 我男人的秘密
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 瑞拉跑腿时偶然遇到逃出监禁的美玲，美玲拜托瑞拉和在旭联络，救出自己。海琳看到美玲还活着的纸条，发现是善爱在帮自己处理美玲的事。.

programme.title: 乘风破浪的姐姐 S2

programme.title: 沙风暴
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/泰) 混乱中，妮茶故意把小莎推给印堤。印堤挟持小莎为人质并逃跑。露娜看见睿吉欲开枪射杀纳瑞，她挡在前面阻止了睿吉却被妮茶大骂一顿.

programme.title: 沙风暴
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/泰)(大结局) 妮茶挟持露娜逃跑，印堤出现揭穿妮茶一直在利用他杀人包括纳拉和漫萱。妮茶不断激怒印堤，印堤盛怒之下向妮茶开枪….

programme.title: 邻里来爆料
programme.desc: (重) 宏茂桥社区卧虎藏龙，骑单轮卖高档海产的老伯、卖一块钱的泰国船面、现买现调的华人咖喱料、24小时有隐私集装箱健身房、高档货潮店，不是每个人都能参观的私人脚车博物馆和邻里中心的3D 壁画，让你一次玩个够.

programme.title: 暖心厨房
programme.desc: (重) 终极“巨无霸”厨房【愿之心】登场！ 这个全年无休为全岛弱势族群服务的厨房，每天烹煮超过9000份便当！在这个一刻都闲不下来的厨房里，谢韵仪要如何找到自己的岗位，并与50位义工并肩完成这项不可能的任务.

programme.title: 与神的约定
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩) 娜京身败名裂还失去了遵叙。消极的娜京答应放弃股份，也同意跟在旭离婚。娜京本来想寻死，却被母亲阻止.

programme.title: VIP
programme.desc: (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 盛俊去找贞善，贞善问他搞外遇的原因。盛俊看到宥利因为失去母亲而痛哭不已，对她十分心疼，还向宥利承诺不会撇下她。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 太阳无法原谅诗月嫁进想害死他的阳地集团。诗月也不想让儿子在继母身边长大，不愿告诉太阳真相.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 泰俊向太阳摊牌，表示已经知道他是六月，并威胁要将他隐瞒真实身份的事公诸于世.

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲
programme.desc: (PG) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自然奇观，.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 室内设计师 简卉君在重新设计和翻新扎哈拉女士的屋子时，考虑到 扎哈拉女士 的娇小身材和行动不便之处。首先，我们的义工必须得在很短的时间内帮忙扎哈拉女士清理杂乱的屋子；他们在移除杂物时，遇到了一些意想不到的阻力.

programme.title: 优雅的家
programme.desc: (PG13-成人题材)(双声道-中/韩) 哲熙想让毛完秀代替毛完俊接任MC集团会长，但帝菊认为完秀根本没资格继承，建议还不如给锡熙继承，哲熙则不肯.

programme.desc: (PG)(重) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自然.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: (重) 室内设计师 简卉君在重新设计和翻新扎哈拉女士的屋子时，考虑到 扎哈拉女士 的娇小身材和行动不便之处。首先，我们的义工必须得在很短的时间内帮忙扎哈拉女士清理杂乱的屋子；他们在移除杂物时，遇到了一些意想不到的阻力.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 太阳无法原谅诗月嫁进想害死他的阳地集团。诗月也不想让儿子在继母身边长大，不愿告诉太阳真相.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 泰俊向太阳摊牌，表示已经知道他是六月，并威胁要将他隐瞒真实身份的事公诸于世.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 S5
programme.desc: (重) 介绍台湾当地的美食与老板背后的故.

programme.title: 世界多美丽
programme.desc: (重)《世界多美丽》是一档真人秀纪实类旅游栏目。将在世界范围内美丽、知名、热议话题目的地旅游体验，通过资深旅游达人的深度游视觉，在目的地，深入旅游体验和大家共享热点话题、旅行感悟，发现新视野，展现不一样的旅行新魅力.

programme.title: 打工捱世界 S2
programme.desc: (重) 这一季的《打工捱世界》，袁伟豪（Ben）和杨明（阿杨）将从游客看不到的角度认识非洲坦桑尼亚和意大利威尼斯。非洲坦桑尼亚并非一个富裕国家，他们在当地打工后有什么体验，又是否会感到富足？ 在「旅游天堂」意大利威尼斯打工依旧是要从低做起！担任渔民，天还没亮便要开工，辛劳而不浪漫。二人还要出卖劳力送货、街头卖艺，又担当餐厅侍应生招呼客人，吸取不一样的工作体验.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 洪智媛儿子海成得了白血病,唯一能配上血型的就是孙如莉. 她拜托如莉的爸爸孙柱浩,希望他能答应女儿捐献骨髓，但是其爸爸却不愿意.

programme.title: VIP
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 玄雅邀请贞善、美娜和智英去她新家庆祝侨居之喜。智英很意外地获知美娜怀孕及贞善要离婚的事。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 泰俊告诉美兰，太阳就是月天的亲孙子，现在正在报复阳地集团。泰俊要美兰想办法阻止太阳的报复行动.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 光日气诗月难忘和太阳的旧情，即使诗月辩解说以为六月已死，才会嫁给光日，光日仍非常难过.

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: (PG-些许毒品相关内容) 2016年菲律宾总统杜特尔特掀起“禁毒战争”，逮捕了许多毒贩和瘾君子。为了掩人耳目，当地毒贩便利用儿童运送毒品。当中不少儿童，因为父母贩毒吸毒被关进监狱，为了张罗三餐，不得不冒着生命危险，也运毒赚取佣金。生长在毒品泛滥的环境里，这些孩子要如何摆脱毒品，开启不一样的人生.

programme.title: 优雅的家
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 锡熙去见周亨日，指出他当年收了帝菊的贿赂，掩盖了杀人凶手案件，并劝告他别太相信帝菊，希望他和自己联手抓捕帝菊。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握.

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: (PG-些许毒品相关内容)(重) 2016年菲律宾总统杜特尔特掀起“禁毒战争”，逮捕了许多毒贩和瘾君子。为了掩人耳目，当地毒贩便利用儿童运送毒品。当中不少儿童，因为父母贩毒吸毒被关进监狱，为了张罗三餐，不得不冒着生命危险，也运毒赚取佣金。生长在毒品泛滥的环境里，这些孩子要如何摆脱毒品，开启不一样的人生.

programme.title: 声音的抉择
programme.desc: (重)《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲.

programme.title: 致2020的我们
programme.desc: (PG) Romeo帮思雅修电脑，成功 ‘复活'电脑，还找回尘封已久的珍贵回忆！2020年，芸汐故意巧遇姿颖，想与她叙旧却遭拒。芸汐回忆，当年玩‘钱仙'。姿颖被吓得要芸汐陪同去公共浴室，惨遭变态偷窥！芸汐追变态而受伤。姿颖难忘芸汐对她的好，觉得事有蹊跷,误会芸汐得了重病；芸汐不否认.

programme.title: VIP
